Qet Botanicals Purely Squalane Serum Boost

Brand: Qet Botanicals

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: EcoCert Approved Plant-Based Squalane

Directions: As a serum boost, apply one to three pumps after your toning water and day or night serum routine. Massage gently on to face, neck, and any exposed skin. May be used morning and n
e used morning and night alone or with your serums.
